name: $HYPERSKIDS
description: Hypers Kids Africa is a dynamic dance and acrobatics group based in Kampala, Uganda. Their mission, "From Ghetto to the World," focuses on uplifting children from street and ghetto areas through performance arts. Facebook The group has gained significant popularity on social media platforms.On Instagram, they celebrated reaching 6 million followers. Instagram Additionally, they have a YouTube channel where they share their performances. YouTube In 2024, Hypers Kids Africa showcased their talents on "America's Got Talent," performing to songs like "Gonna Make You Sweat" by C+C Music Factory. YouTube Their energetic performances received positive feedback from both judges and audiences.Beyond entertainment, the group is dedicated to supporting underprivileged children by providing opportunities in dance and acting, aiming to transform lives and communities through their art.
